document_data.name: Ariella Kulmina
document_data.mainbody: '''Ariella Kulmina''' was a [[Windsoul genasi]] [[swordmage]] from [[Airspur]].  In [[1479 DR]] she traveled with a delegation from [[Akanûl]] to [[Almraiven]].  While in Almraiven she became friends with the [[Earthsoul genasi]] [[Cephas]] and taught him how to manifest as a Windsoul.
document_data.Appearance: Like many Windsouls, Ariella has silver skin.
